title: HiRecorder.1.00.Incl.Keygen-ONY
description:
APPLICATION : HiRecorder 1.00 Incl Keygen
         OS : Win
       TYPE : Video Recorder
        WWW : http://www.hirecorder.com
    RELDATE : no idea
 PROTECTION : Aspack / Serial
 CRKRELDATE : 09/04/2008

INSTALLATION: Install.
              Use keygen to generate your "Site License" serial.

       NOTES: 
              The name function in the keygen has the only purpose
              to make your serial unique to you. You can still register
              HiRecorder with any name with the generated key.
              Please use chars like a-z and/or numbers. Chars like %_# )]/!
              will work but might be banned in future versions.
              
              Nuff said. Enjoy! / ONY

       ABOUT:
       
              HiRecorder is a real-time sound recorder which offers professional
              recording features with MP3 support. The sound recorder program is
              designed to work with your sound card directly and smoothly, so it
              can record almost all audio streaming from your sound card with
              perfect quality. It can record sound from sources including
              microphone, line-in, stereo mixer, mono out, etc., and also audio
              streaming from any other programs (like WinAMP, Real One Player, 
              Windows Media Player, and so on.)

              Direct to disk function enables you to record sound without running 
              out of memory as long as there is enough disk space available. 
              HiRecord can also record directly to MP3 format that you may set from
              the options dialog, and it will save your valuable disk space. You
              could select the different MP3 recording modes when needed.

              HiRecorder is also a great way to record streaming music from the
              popular Digital Music Services and more:

              * LAUNCHcast
              * Real Radio
              * Pandora

              Best Features

              * Record high quality MP3s from online radio and music services
              
              * Direct to disk ability allows you to record without stopping
              
              * Make individual song files split precisely and accurately into
                separate tracks
                
              * Stop Recording automatically
              
              * Support recording to mp3 file directly without creating any
                temporary files
                
              * Easy to use playback function
              
              * Automatically tags songs with title, artist, album and genre
                information
              
              * Single Task Schedule
              
              * File Length Limitation System
              
              * Real-time oscilloscope
              
              * Record-Pause function
              
              * Ease of use interface
              
              * Operation Indicators
              
              * ID3 Tag Editor

              blah, blah, blah...
